item.description:
Hi Everyone,
By request, we will be reading State of Wonder by Ann Patchett for our July discussion. Here is a brief description...A researcher at a pharmaceutical company, Marina Singh journeys into the heart of the Amazonian delta to check on a field team that has been silent for two years--a dangerous assignment that forces Marina to confront the ghosts of her past.Â 

Hope you enjoy the book.

group.name: The Brookline Book Club Meetup Group

item.name: July Book Discussion
